document.full_text: the death of new york rangers enforcer derek boogaard was an accident, due to a toxic mix of alcohol and the powerful painkiller oxycodone.
document.title: rangers' boogaard died of alcohol, oxycodone mix
lines_and_colors: the death of new york rangers enforcer derek boogaard was an accident, due to a toxic mix of alcohol and the powerful painkiller oxycodone.
